bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lao sun 勞損 , exhaustion detriment. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu pen zi 覆 盆子 quoting Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 療勞損風虛，補肝明目 , “It cures exhaustion detriment and wind [intruding into a state of] depletion, supplements the liver and clears the eyes”, writes: 療癆損風虛，補肝明目 , “It cures exhaustion-illness detriment and wind [intruding into a state of] depletion, supplements the liver and clears the eyes”.
